Package it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Model.card.weapon_cards

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cyberblade
    This class represents the weapon Cyberblade
    EletroSchyte
    It represents the card ElectroSchyte it uses two method for the two alternative modality checkBasicMode() and checkReaper()
    Flamethrower
    This class implements the weapon Flamethrower.
    Furnace
    This class implements the weapon Furnace.
    GrenadeLauncher
    This class implements the weapon Grenade Launcher.
    HeatSeeker
    This class implements the weapon Heatseeker.
    Hellion
    This class implements the weapon Hellion.
    LockRifle
    It represents the card LockRifle it uses two method to check if the weapon can be used checkBasicMode() and checkSecondLock()
    MachineGun
    It represents the card MachineGun it uses three method for the three different modality checkBasicMode(),checkFocusShotMode() and checkTurretTripodeMode()
    MethodsWeapons
    This class implements special methods used by some weapons.
    PlasmaGun
    It represents the card PlasmaGun it uses two method to check if the weapon can be used checkAllTarget() and checkPhaseGlide()
    PowerGlow
    This class represents the weapon powerglow
    Railgun
    This class represents the weapon Railgun
    RocketLauncher
    This class implements the weapon Rocket Laucher.
    Shockwave
    This class represents the weapon ShockWave
    Shotgun
    This class represents the weapon Shotgun
    Sledgehammer
    This class represents the weapon Sledgehammer
    THOR
    It represents the card Thor it uses three method for the three alternative modality checkBasicMode(),checkChainReaction() and checkHighVoltage()
    TractorBeam
    It represents the card TractatorBeam it uses two method for the two alternative modality checkMoveBasicMode() and checkPunisherMode ()
    VortexCannon
    This class implements the weapon Vortex Cannon.
    WeaponCard
    This class implements a weapon.
    Whisper
    It represents the card Whisper it uses one method to check if the weapon can be used checkBasicMode()
    ZX2
    This class represents the weapon ZX2
